definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: I think my mother is a good housewife.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我妈妈是一个非常棒的家庭主妇。

sentences.english: Housewives were picking out vegetables and bargaining with the sellers.
sentences.chinese: 家庭主妇们一边挑选蔬菜，一边和卖主讨价还加。

sentences.english: Will you be a housewife or a househusband ?
sentences.chinese: 你会成为家庭主妇或主男吗？

sentences.english: My mother's name is Irma Hill. She is also a farmer and a housewife.
sentences.chinese: 我的母亲厄玛希尔也是农民，并是家庭主妇。

sentences.english: As a housewife, she has to do almost all the housework.
sentences.chinese: 作为家庭主妇，她几乎做了全部家务。

sentences.english: The mother is usually the homemaker.
To get (or buy) a bottle of soy sauce, housewives in Shenzhen now consider (or think about) going to Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 为打一瓶酱油，深圳家庭主妇现在考虑跑一趟香港。
无论是忙碌的家庭主妇还是专业人士。
埃玛是个节省的家庭主妇。

sentences.english: The heat of these irons was different from that used by housewives.
sentences.chinese: 这些熨斗跟家庭主妇们的熨牛大不相同。

sentences.english: was housewives' feeling of guilt about using it.
sentences.chinese: 家庭主妇们觉得使用它是有罪的。
家庭主妇在电器行进行竞选活动。

sentences.english: Among the mothers are both office workers and housewives.
sentences.chinese: 这些妈妈既是上班族又是家庭主妇。

sentences.english: Housewives can do shopping and pay bills without leaving their homes.
sentences.chinese: 家庭主妇可以在足不出户的情况下购物和支付账单。

sentences.english: Smoothing things over is practically a profession to mothers of families.
sentences.chinese: 息事宁人可说是家庭主妇的专职。

definition: housewife/woman of senior authority in a household/the lady of the house/hostess
a good wife and loving mother
to assist one's husband and educate the children (idiom)/the traditional roles of a good wife
variant of 賢慧|贤慧[xian2 hui4]
to have no need to fend for oneself (idiom)/to lead a pampered life
pinyin: shi2 zhi3 bu4 zhan1 yang2 chun1 shui3

definition: (said of sb else's wife) a good wife
